extendedInfo.description: If you can't open it, download "ClearDefaultHome" or "Home Switcher"- Super-smooth scrolling- Animated screen previews (like ExposÃ© or HTC Sense)- Up to 7 home screens- App drawer (2D and 3D!) with a fly-in effect and smooth scrolling- Scrollable shortcut dockFor support, please visit our forums.

reviews.title: Fastest launcher imo
reviews.comment: On my Optimus S, this launcher runs the smoothest out of the 10 or so others I tried. I don\'t get why people complain about lack of updates... What is there to fix honestly?  Keep up the great work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks good, but...
reviews.comment: FC or becomes unresponsive too much. No updates in months. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Highly customizable, intuitive and fast. Great widgets!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: simple yet wonderful
reviews.comment: The best part of this app is fast and runs on low memory pretty well
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: by Wolf
reviews.comment: three stars cause was my first launcher... it is good... buI\'m using TSF now... but if u don\'t want a eye candy launcher, and you\'re lookin for something smooth, with 0 lag, simple and functional. This is your best choise :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Calendar doesn\'t work.  Came see agenda or add events. Please fix. I\'ve used launcher pro for years but now on Galaxy Nexus the calendar no longer works.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love that I can hide icons which I seldom use, calendar widget is amazing, and animations are sweet. Much more convenient than Motoblur on my Atrix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its great...
reviews.comment: Better than the default launcher. Its the best so far. For sure im staying with this. It runs  soo smooth. Ifs really fast in my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Runs smoothly, very customisable and a very good design. Best launcher out there!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Abandonware, dev has disappeared
reviews.comment: This app, along with the dev\'s other apps, have been abandoned. No updates in over a year, close to two years for some. The forums have been overtaken with spam. The dev has seemingly vanished off the face of the earth. Maybe he died?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Awesome app, my home looks gorgeous, my SGS is even more amazing. Recommend a lot! (android 2.3.5)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best to me
reviews.comment: Speedy on Gingerbread and ICS.  Never crashes on my Gingerbread, now ICS. Did I say it is speedy?  Tried the others, even with no updates, this is best.  RIP
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great but.....
reviews.comment: is great! it made my xperia x10 supersmooth and has a galaxy s feel! only thing that i consider as disadvantage is the lack of updates :/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app is dead.
reviews.comment: I have given up on LPP and have fully migrated to Go Launcher. At this point, I\'m not likely to return even if the promised update ever actually releases.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love HTC sense on my incredible s but the stuff you can do on this is amazing, I found it to speed up my phone and it works! Great work keep it up!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best launcher I have come across
reviews.comment: Its fast, it saves the precious ram, and its simple... Other launchers do neither of the above.... Just love it.... Keep up the good work ..
reviews.author: Akshay Sheth

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S Vibrant running ICS-Passion ROM
reviews.comment: So far, so good!  Just installed the app for the first time and I love the versatility it gives me in customizing my Android experience.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best launcher!
reviews.comment: Tried them all - LP is the most dependable, stable and functional. Great app great developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Amazing. Saved my atrix from motoblur. Runs super smooth and fast and has great features. 3d home screen and appdrawer are great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Most stable, fastest, effortless
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried most of the launchers, but LP is the fastest. No glitches, no hangups. If you want performance, use LP.
reviews.author: A Google User
